entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Blizzard developing late this morning. Wind east 30 km/h except 80 near the Richardson mountains this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 30 km/h except 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
